attributes.action: Request the Metropolitan Police Commisioner to launch a full investigation...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request the Metropolitan Police Commisioner to launch a full investigation and audit into what are clearly fraudulent and immoral claims and misappropriation of funds at the British tax payers expense made by all levels of government, MP's, Peers etc and the full extent of the law be brought down on these people who are blatantly abusing there position of trust for profit  and especially in these hard times when many a British family are worrying about securing there own homes and jobs with no finacial backing from anywhere.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
